page.title: 10Lodge Moor Area.
page.content: The Lodge Moor area is very varied. It has some woodland left and is the newest estate in our area. We have a choice of going to 2 schools. They are both about a mile walk. The entertainment we have includes discos at the community centre. It offers everything from Bingo to Judo. There is a little park on Moors road. The estate has grown quickly. The dwellings are mostly semi-detached or terraced houses. On Scotter Road there are five shops. A D.I.Y. shop, Greengrocers, Bread shop, Hair Dressers and a shop that sells just about everything, with a great name;'Bits 'n' Bobs'. It has been rebuilt recently. The shops have a tiny car park. Just around the corner there is a small timber yard.
